Wapres Jenguk Waketum MUI di RS PKU Yogyakarta
07 Nov 2019, 17:35 by Munarsih Sahana



Wapres Jenguk Waketum MUI di RS PKU Yogyakarta



Wapres Jenguk Waketum MUI di RS PKU Yogyakarta


KBRN, Yogyakarta: Wakil Presiden Ma’ruf  Amin menjenguk Wakil Ketua Umum Majelis Ulama Indonesia, MUI yang juga Ketua Pimpinan Pusat Muhammadiyah Prof. Yunahar Ilyas yang sedang dirawat di RS PKU Yogyakarta.
Dalam kunjungan kerja di propinsi Jawa Tengah dan Yogyakarta, Wakil Presiden beserta Ibu Wury Estu Handayani Ma’ruf , Kamis (7/11/2019) menyempatkan untuk menjenguk Wakil Ketua Umum MUI yang juga Ketua Pimpinan Pusat Muhammadiyah Prof dr Yunahar Ilyas yang sedang dirawat di Ruang VVIP RS PKU Muhammadiyah Kota Yogyakarta.
Selama sekitar 15 menit, Wakil presiden dan Ibu Wury Ma’ruf didampingi Gubernur DIY Sultan HB X, Wailkota Yogyakarta Haryadi Suyuti, Dirut RS PKU dokter Muhamad Komarudin serta dua dokter yang merawat yaitu dokter Iqbal dan dokter Rurul Zakin Spesialis Bedah menjenguk Prof Yunahar Ilyas. Walikota Haryadi Suyuti menggambarkan pertemuan yang menyenangkan antara Wakil presiden Ma’ruf Amin dan Prof Dr Yunahar Ilyas di ruang VVIP Zamzam.
“Begitu ketemu beliau berdoa, mendoakan agar pak Yunahar diberi kesehatan, kekuatan. Wapres dan pak Yunahar Ilyas tampak sangat akrab, pak Yunahar tampak sangat baik sebagai sesama pengurus MUI bahkan tadi wapres mengatakan pak Yunahar calon pengganti beliau (sebagai Ketum MUI), sehingga wapres mendoakan dia sehat kembali karena masih dibutuhkan ummat”, kata Walikota Haryadi Suyuti di RS PKU Muhammadiyah Yogyakarta.
Sementara itu, direktur utama RS PKU Muhammadiyah kota Yogyakarta dr Muhammad Komarudin menjelaskan, kondisi kesehatan Prof. Yunahar Ilyas semakin stabil dan saat ini sedang menunggu pelaksanaan proses cangkok ginjal yang direncanakan dilakukan di RSUP DR Sardjito dalam waktu dekat.
“Sebenarnya pak Yunahar sudah beberapa waktu ini sakit gagal ginjal dan sekarang dalam proses cuci darah seminggu dua kali, mohon doanya saja semoga diberi kemudahan. Perawatan terakhir ini opname 10 hari," jelas dr.Komarudin.
dr.Komarudin menambahkan kondisi Yunahar saat ini cukup stabil tinggal menunggu pemulihan dan dalam beberapa hari sudah dapat rawat jalan.
Sebelumnya, dalam kunjungan di wilayah kabupaten Magelang wakil presiden Ma’ruf Amin meresmikan rumah sakit swasta Syubbanul Wathon serta bertemu para kiai di asrama Perguraan Islam Magelang hingga Pondok Pesantren Darussalam.
Dalam kunjungan tersebut, selain didampingi Ibu Wury Ma’ruf, wakil presiden juga didampingi Ketua Umum PKB Muhaimin Iskandar, Menteri Desa Pembangunan Daerah Tertinggal dan Transmigrasi Abdul Halim Iskandar, Kepala Sekretariat Wakil Presiden Mohamad Oemar, Deputi Bidang Dukungan Kebijakan Pembangunan Manusia dan Pemerataan Pembangunan Bambang Widianto.

The Vice President Visits Waketum MUI at Yogyakarta PKU Hospital
Nov 7 2019, 17:35 by Munarsih Sahana



The Vice President Visits Waketum MUI at Yogyakarta PKU Hospital



The Vice President Visits Waketum MUI at Yogyakarta PKU Hospital


KBRN, Yogyakarta: Vice President Ma'ruf Amin visited the Deputy Chairperson of the Indonesian Ulema Council, MUI who is also the Chairman of the Muhammadiyah Central Chair Prof. Yunahar Ilyas who is being treated at Yogyakarta PKU Hospital.
During a working visit in the provinces of Central Java and Yogyakarta, the Vice President along with Mrs. Wury Estu Handayani Ma'ruf, Thursday (11/07/2019) took time to visit the MUI Deputy Chairperson who was also the Chairperson of Muhammadiyah Central Executive Prof. Dr. Yunahar Ilyas who was being treated at VVIP Room of PKU Muhammadiyah Hospital, Yogyakarta City.
For about 15 minutes, the vice president and Mrs. Wury Ma'ruf were accompanied by DIY Governor Sultan HB X, Yogyakarta Wailkota Haryadi Suyuti, PKU Hospital's Managing Director doctor Muhamad Komarudin and two treating doctors namely Iqbal doctor and Rurul Zakin surgeon visiting Prof Yunahar Ilyas. Mayor Haryadi Suyuti described a pleasant meeting between Vice-president Ma'ruf Amin and Prof. Dr. Yunahar Ilyas in the Zamzam VVIP room.
"As soon as he was met he prayed, praying for Mr. Yunahar to be given health, strength. The Vice President and Mr. Yunahar Ilyas looked very familiar, Mr. Yunahar looked very good as a fellow MUI administrator. In fact, the Vice President said that Mr. Yunahar was his replacement candidate (as Chairman of the Indonesian Ulema Council), so the Vice President prayed that he was healthy again because the ummah was still needed, "said Mayor Haryadi Suyuti in PKU Muhammadiyah Hospital Yogyakarta.
Meanwhile, the managing director of PKU Muhammadiyah Hospital in Yogyakarta city Dr. Muhammad Komarudin explained, Prof.'s health condition Yunahar Ilyas is increasingly stable and is currently awaiting the implementation of the kidney transplant process which is planned to be carried out at Dr. Sardjito General Hospital in the near future.
"Actually, Mr. Yunahar has been suffering from kidney failure for quite some time now and is now in the process of dialysis twice a week, please pray that I hope he will be provided with ease. This last treatment was hospitalized for 10 days, "explained Dr. Komarudin.
Dr. Komomudin added that the current condition of Yunahar was quite stable, just waiting for recovery and in a few days was able to be treated as outpatient.
Previously, during a visit to the district of Magelang, vice-president Ma'ruf Amin inaugurated the Syubbanul Wathon private hospital and met the kiai in the boarding house of the Islamic Magelang School up to the Islamic Boarding School in Darussalam.
During the visit, besides accompanied by Mrs. Wury Ma'ruf, the vice president was also accompanied by PKB Chairperson Muhaimin Iskandar, Minister of Rural Development and Transmigration Areas Abdul Halim Iskandar, Head of Secretariat Vice President Mohamad Oemar, Deputy for Human Development Policy Support and Equity Development Bambang Widianto.
